name: Hotel Porton Medellin

reviews.text: I recently stayed at the Porton de Medellin. I found this property to be clean, modern, safe and the service was excellent.
reviews.title: Porton De Medellin

description: A sober and elegant Hotel, located in the most exclusive area near a major business centers, financial and trade. The hotel is known for its peaceful and welcoming environments. For rest and relaxation with a solarium terrace equipped with jacuzzy, hydromassage shower and steam bath. All rates include breakfast buffet and a wireless Internet connection unlimited. The warm service and personalized direct engagement with our guest
